channel.title: [TUT]How to make a webclient: Easy!
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][I]This is a hand written guide by myself (Programmer , Owner of Kingdomscape). I give [U]no[/U] permission for ANYONE to post this anywhere but myself. Mopar_scape user: tizland Rune_locus: ProgramerForever or ProgrammerForever Rune_server: Rsps[/I][/B][/CENTER] [B]This will help you create a webclient which will be easy as you only need to edit 1 thing. so this will not include auto cache downloader![/B] You will need: - A client (Can have customs , but think of the cache size. Can be any type bluurs,delta,PI. But has to have signlink.java/signlink.class) -JarMaker : [URL=http://"http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/products/utilities/jarmaker/JARMaker.zip"]Download here[/URL] - A brain - A web host - A place to upload your cache [i]step 1[/i] Find your signlink.java (normally located in /sign/) Now search:
findcachedir()
You should see something about cache. Probally ./cache/ or
String as[] = { "./cache/"
Change the ./cache/ to
C:/yourcachename/
ovb change "yourcachename" to your client/server name. And then save and complie [i]step 2[/i] Jarring and signing: Please watch this video and do exactly what it says, *This video i take no credit for*; [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9obXgxm_9qY&fmt=18"]watch now[/URL] [i]step 3[/i] Upload the client.jar to your webhost. .zip your cache but rename it as C:/yourcachename/ and upload it also. And now make a page with this code:
Your Webclient Download the cache from [url=http://www.yourwebsite.com/(wateva]www.yourwebsite.com/(wateva[/url] it iz).zip and extract it to C:/ and reload this page!
Enjoy !

item.title: [TUT]How to make a webclient: Easy!
item.dc:creator: @Epicmaul Epicmaul
item.description:
@Epicmaul wrote:

.\sign\signlink.java:36: ';' expected String s = C:/cache/ ^ .\sign\signlink.java:36: cannot find symbol symbol : variable C location: class sign.signlink String s = C:/legendarypkers/ ^ .\sign\signlink.java:36: cannot find symbol symbol : variable legendarypkers location: class sign.signlink String s = C:/cache/ ^ .\sign\signlink.java:36: unexpected type required: variable found : value String s = C:/cache/ ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT]How to make a webclient: Easy!
item.dc:creator: @hejhej123 hejhej123
item.description:
@hejhej123 wrote:

  • A brain
  • A web host
  • A place to upload your cache

step 1
Find your signlink.java (normally located in /sign/)

Now search:

findcachedir()

You should see something about cache. Probally ./cache/

or

String as[] = { "./cache/"

Change the ./cache/ to

C:/yourcachename/
ovb change "yourcachename" to your client/server name.

And then save and complie

step 2

Jarring and signing:
Please watch this video and do exactly what it says, This video i take no credit for; watch now

step 3

Upload the client.jar to your webhost.
.zip your cache but rename it as C:/yourcachename/ and upload it also.
And now make a page with this code:

Your Webclient Download the cache from [url=http://www.yourwebsite.com/(wateva]www.yourwebsite.com/(wateva[/url] it iz).zip and extract it to C:/ and reload this page!

Enjoy !
[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT]How to make a webclient: Easy!
item.dc:creator: @goodone123 goodone123
item.description:
@goodone123 wrote:

<TITLE>Your Webclient</TITLE>
<META HTTP-EQUIV="PRAGMA" CONTENT="NO-CACHE">
</HEAD>

<BODY>

<applet name="yourclientname" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class">
<param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m">
</applet>
Download the cache from www.yourwebsite.com/(wateva it iz).zip and extract it to C:/ and reload this page!
</BODY>
</HTML>
</BODY>
</HTML>

Come on man… You have that “download your cache from…”

Do we include that in the code or not? will you please make it clear.

or is it just:

[code]

Your Webclient [/code]?

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT]How to make a webclient: Easy!
item.dc:creator: @dude08 dude08
item.description:
@dude08 wrote:

[quote=“Mod-Vlad-, post:9, topic:365122”][quote author=dude08 link=topic=461323.msg3414117#msg3414117 date=1290919660]
yo can someone help me? i got a signlink.class file and i cant find the ./cache/ or string as
[/quote]
Sir, actually you cannot find any item in .class file. You should have signlink.java , that should look like .txt file. I guess, your client is anti-leech or JAVA-dcr client. I recomment to you just use other version of client. Like blurrr’s one?[/quote]

Alright man thanks for your help.

Read full topic
